Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

I have reduced the ec2 instrance type of webserver from compute optimized (c6g.12xlarge) to General purpose (t3a.2xlarge) to bring down the cost under $6,500. It is assumned that the activity won't peak during all the time and only during certain times which would be fairly handled by the burstable nature of t3a instance types
